requirements_en.minimum:

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: 1 Ghz

  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
